notesStmt.note: Distinctly separate paragraphs. Not yet fully catalogued. Metadata based on image and Advanced Papyrological Information System (APIS) data. Title based on Prof. Robert A. Kraft's 1990 survey of University Museum Hebrew Manuscripts. Complete double folio from a printed quire: four pages, one column per page.

msIdentifier.repository: University of Pennsylvania Museum of Archaeology and Anthropology

history.provenance: University of Pennsylvania Museum, Ellen W. Harrison Collection Purchased from Prof. Moritz of Cairo through W.M. Muller, 1910.
